name: Crankies Workshop: Grizzbot Assembly
description: Crankies Workshop is a true or false question game with a colorful and friendly atmosphere. Crankie needs help assembling his new order of Grizzbot's and he needs you to answer the knowledge machines questions to keep it assembling the robots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
